org.apache.edgent.streamscope

Class StreamScopeSetup

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.edgent.streamscope.StreamScopeSetup

  • public class StreamScopeSetup
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility helpers for StreamScope setup and management.

    This class is not thread safe.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

      static void addStreamScopes(Topology t)
      Add StreamScope instances to the topology Instrument the topology by adding StreamScope peekers to the topology's streams.

      Perform the registrations needed to use the streamscope package.

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public static void register(ServiceContainer services)
        Perform the registrations needed to use the streamscope package.

        Typically called during TopologyProvider construction.

        • register the StreamScopeRegistry service
        • register a cleaner to remove job oplet StreamScope registrations
        • register a StreamScopeRegistryMXBean with the registered ControlService
        Parameters:
        services - ServiceContainer to register with.

      • addStreamScopes

        public static void addStreamScopes(Topology t)
        Add StreamScope instances to the topology

        Instrument the topology by adding StreamScope peekers to the topology's streams. At topology submission time, StreamScopes register themselves with the topology's StreamScopeRegistry runtime service.

        Parameters:
        t - the Topology. The operation is a no-op if the topology does not have a StreamScopeRegistry service.
        See Also:
        register, Graph.peekAll()
